item.title: iPhone 17 Pro 机身褪色上热搜，触屏版 MacBook Pro 再曝光
item.guid: iPhone-17-Pro-机身褪色上热搜，触屏版-MacBook-Pro-再曝光
item.description:
Recently, netizens on platforms like reddit and X have posted, pointing out that their Starry Orange/Dark Blue iPhone 17 Pro series devices have experienced varying degrees of body discoloration, and related topics such as "iPhone 17 reported body fading" have even topped trending searches. 近期，有网友在 reddit、X 等平台发文指出， 自己手上的星宇橙/深蓝色 iPhone 17 Pro 系列出现了不同程度机身变色，「iPhone 17 被曝机身褪色」等相关话题也一度登上热搜。

The released images show that the aluminum alloy back cover of the discolored iPhone 17 Pro has changed from orange to rose red, forming a strong contrast with the orange of other components. Users who encountered this emphasized that they did not post-process the images; the dark blue version of the iPhone 17 Pro, on the other hand, shows different colored marks. 从放出的图片显示，出现变色情况的 iPhone 17 Pro 的铝合金后盖从橙色变为了玫红色，与其他零部件的橙色形成了强烈对比，并且遇到的网友强调自己并没有对图片进行后期处理；深蓝色版本的 iPhone 17 Pro 则会出现不同色的印痕。

Regarding the cause of the fading, many affected users speculate it is related to ultraviolet light. They stated that after briefly placing their phones in sunlight, they observed obvious fading. Some users even joked that by simply exposing the "Starry Orange" iPhone 17 Pro to the sun for a while, they could get a unique "Rose Gold" phone for free. 而关于褪色原因，许多受影响的用户推测与紫外线有关。他们表示，在将手机短暂置于阳光下之后，便观察到了明显的褪色现象。部分用户甚至调侃称，只需将「星宇橙」 iPhone 17 Pro 放在太阳下晒一会儿，就能免费获得一台独特的「玫瑰金」手机。

On October 17, blogger Digital Chat Station posted that as of October 12, the iPhone 17 series had nearly 4 million activations, and during the week of the 12th, the entire series secured the top three spots in single-item sales, with the iPhone 17 Pro Max exceeding 600,000 activations in a single week. 10 月 17 日，博主数码闲聊站则发文表示，截至 10 月 12 日， iPhone 17 系列已激活量近 400 万台，并在 12 日当周全系包揽单品前三，其中 iPhone 17 Pro Max 单周激活量突破 60 万台。

According to media analysis, Apple's outstanding performance in the third quarter is mainly due to two factors: 而据媒体分析，苹果在三季度的亮眼表现，主要得益于两方面因素：

    Price Reductions and Promotions: As Double 11 approaches, the entire iPhone 17 series has ushered in a new round of price adjustments, with the iPhone 17 Pro and Pro Max seeing a 300 yuan discount at the Tmall Apple Store official flagship store.

    Numerous Upgrades: The standard version offers high refresh rate and fast charging; the Pro series sees major changes in imaging and appearance; and the new Air has been launched.

Additionally, Bloomberg reporter Mark Gurman recently revealed that Apple is preparing a new MacBook Pro with touchscreen functionality, planned for release in late 2026 or early 2027. 另外，彭博社记者 Mark Gurman 近日发文透露， 苹果正在准备一款配备触屏功能的全新 MacBook Pro，并计划 2026 年底或 2027 年初推出。

It is reported that the new models, codenamed K114 and K116, will feature a lighter and thinner body than current models and will use M6 series processors. Apple will also research screen hinges to prevent screen rebound during touch interactions. 据悉，新机代号为 K114 和 K116，拥有比现款更轻更薄的机身，采用 M6 系列处理器。同时苹果还将对屏幕铰链进行研究，以防止触控时屏幕出现回弹现象。

Regarding the screen, the touchscreen MacBook Pro will be equipped with an OLED display. Notably, Gurman stated in the article that the newly designed touchscreen MacBook Pro is expected to eliminate the long-criticized "notch" and adopt a punch-hole design, similar to the iPhone's Dynamic Island. 屏幕方面，触屏版 MacBook Pro 将配备 OLED 屏幕。值得一提的是，Gurman 在文中表示， 新设计的触屏版 MacBook Pro 有望淘汰掉诟病已久的「刘海」，并采用挖孔设计，类似 iPhone 的灵动岛。

Gurman also revealed that Apple is exploring another major Mac change: Touch ID (fingerprint unlock) transitioning to Face ID (3D facial recognition). However, he also stated that this would take several more years. Gurman 还透露，苹果正在探索另一项重大的 Mac 变革： Touch ID（指纹解锁）转向 Face ID（3D 人脸）。 但其也表示，这还需要几年时间。

Gurman pointed out that Apple had previously been very resistant to touchscreen MacBooks, mainly due to 'concerns that touchscreen MacBooks would cannibalize iPad sales.' However, the boundaries between MacBook and iPad are now gradually disappearing: both use M-series processors, and their system designs are becoming increasingly similar. Gurman 指出，此前苹果一直对触屏 MacBook 很排斥，主要原因归结于「担心触屏 MacBook 会蚕食 iPad 的销量」。而现如今，MacBook 与 iPad 的边界逐渐消失：同样都用 M 系列处理器，系统设计越来越靠近。

At the same time, Gurman also stated that the touchscreen MacBook will mark Apple's belated move to 'follow popular trends.' He also left a cliffhanger, saying, 'This will not be the last time.' 同时 Gurman 也表示， 触屏版 MacBook 将会开启苹果迟来的「顺应流行趋势」走向。 其还留下了一个悬念，表示「这并不会是最后一次。」

item.title: 法国卢浮宫被盗过程仅 7 分钟
item.guid: 法国卢浮宫被盗过程仅-7-分钟
item.description:
According to Xinhua News Agency, a robbery occurred at the Louvre Museum in Paris, the capital of France, on the morning of October 19. The museum subsequently announced a temporary closure for one day. Later, the Louvre announced that the museum would be closed that day for special reasons. 据新华社报道，位于法国首都巴黎的卢浮宫博物馆 10 月 19 日上午发生抢劫事件，馆方随后宣布临时闭馆一天。随后卢浮宫宣布，出于特殊原因，博物馆当日关闭。

According to multiple media reports, at around 9:30 to 9:40 local time, several masked individuals arrived at the scene. They used a small electric saw to break a window in a maintenance area on the Seine River side of the museum, entered the target room, and stole 9 pieces of Napoleonic-era jewelry. 综合多家媒体消息，当地时间 9 点 30 分至 40 分左右，数名蒙面人员到达现场，从博物馆朝塞纳河一侧正在维修的区域，使用小型电锯破坏窗户，进入目标房间，劫走 9 件拿破仑时期珠宝。

French Interior Minister Laurent Nunez, in an interview with French media, said that this 'major robbery' was completed by 'an experienced team' in 'a very short time.' According to his description, the suspects used a lift on a truck to enter the museum, smashed glass to commit the crime, and the entire process took only 7 minutes . The value of the stolen artifacts is 'inestimable.' 法国内政部长洛朗·努内兹在接受法媒采访时说，这起「重大抢劫案」 由「一支经验丰富的团队」在「极短时间内」完成。 据其描述，嫌疑人利用卡车上的升降装置进入博物馆，砸碎玻璃作案， 整个过程仅 7 分钟 ，被抢走的文物价值「无法估量」。

The suspects are currently at large, but there are conflicting reports on how long the crime took. French Culture Minister Rachida Dati said in a media interview that the crime took less than 4 minutes. 目前嫌疑人在逃，但嫌疑人作案花了多少时间目前众说纷纭，法国文化部长拉茜达·达蒂在接受媒体采访时说，作案时间不到 4 分钟。

Nunez stated that the major armed robbery at the Louvre exposed 'significant security vulnerabilities' in the French museum system. 努内兹表示，卢浮宫发生的重大持械抢劫案暴露出法国博物馆体系「存在较大安全脆弱性」。

According to French media reports, the stolen artifacts include necklaces, brooches, crowns, etc., but the 'Regent Diamond,' weighing over 140 carats, was not stolen. 据法国媒体报道， 被抢走的文物包括项链、胸针、皇冠等，而重逾 140 克拉的「摄政王钻石」并未被抢走。

One piece of jewelry was dropped by the suspects during their escape and has since been recovered. According to Le Parisien, a crown found outside the Louvre Museum, possibly belonging to Empress Eugénie, wife of Napoleon III, was damaged when discovered. 其中，一件珠宝在嫌疑人逃跑过程中被遗落，现已被找回。按《巴黎人报》的说法，在卢浮宫博物馆外找到的是一顶皇冠，可能属于拿破仑三世的妻子欧仁妮皇后，被发现时已经破损。

Additionally, according to an interview with Louvre guide Alan by Red Star News, the robbers' target was the Apollo Gallery. The Apollo Gallery is described as the most luxurious gallery in the Louvre, with its construction history dating back to Henry IV, the first king of the Bourbon dynasty. 'The robbers were likely after the most valuable exhibits.' 另据红星新闻采访卢浮宫讲解员阿蓝获悉，匪徒的目标是阿波罗长廊。据介绍，阿波罗长廊是卢浮宫最奢华的长廊，长廊的修建历史可以追溯到波旁王朝第一位国王亨利四世。「劫匪应该是奔着最名贵展品去的。」

Alan speculated that if the aforementioned crown was stolen, then 'two other treasures in the same display case were probably also taken': including a pearl crown and a brooch made of over four thousand diamonds. Alan pessimistically predicted that the collections 'would likely be dismantled immediately,' especially the brooch, as the robbers would try to quickly fence the goods. 阿蓝推测，如果上述皇冠被盗，那么「同一个展柜里的另外两件至宝，估计也被抢走了」：包括一顶珍珠王冠，一件由四千多颗钻石制作的胸针。阿蓝悲观地预测，藏品「应该会被马上拆掉的」，尤其是那件胸针，因为劫匪会尝试迅速销赃。

item.title: 苹果 CEO：Apple Intelligence 正努力入华
item.description:
On October 18, Apple CEO Tim Cook appeared in Shanghai, engaging in a dialogue with Bai Chong'en, Dean of Tsinghua University's School of Economics and Management and Chairman of the Global Wealth Management Forum Executive Committee, at the Global Wealth Management Forum · 2025 Shanghai Suhewan Conference. 10 月 18 日， 苹果公司首席执行官蒂姆·库克（Tim Cook）现身上海，在全球财富管理论坛·2025 上海苏河湾大会上，与清华大学经管学院院长、全球财富管理论坛执委会主席白重恩进行了对话。

According to a report by China Business News, during the dialogue session, Cook revealed on the topic of 'the boundaries of innovation in a technology-driven era' that Apple is actively promoting the entry of Apple Intelligence into the Chinese market. 据第一财经报道，在对话环节中， 库克就「科技驱动时代的创新边界」议题透露， 苹果正积极推动 Apple Intelligence 进入中国市场。

He stated: 'We are pushing Apple Intelligence into China, integrating AI capabilities at the operating system level, allowing people to leverage the power of AI in all the applications they use every day.' 他表示： 「我们正在推动苹果智能进入中国，在操作系统层面整合人工智能的功能，让人们在每天使用的所有应用程序中，都能借助 AI 的力量。」

Cook particularly emphasized the important value of AI technology, pointing out that AI is changing people's lives and even saving lives. It is reported that this week, during his visit to Apple's Pudong Lujiazui flagship store in Shanghai, he specifically discussed health monitoring features such as fall detection on Apple Watch with Chinese consumers. 库克特别强调了 AI 技术的重要价值， 他指出 AI 正在改变人们生活甚至挽救生命。据悉，本周在走访苹果上海浦东陆家嘴旗舰店时， 他特别与中国消费者交流了 Apple Watch 的跌倒检测等健康监测功能。

Furthermore, the report mentioned that facilitating the launch of Apple Intelligence in China was one of Cook's core objectives for this trip. He also bore the important mission of negotiating with domestic carriers to promote eSIM technology in the iPhone Air. 此外，报道中提到，促成 Apple Intelligence 在华发布是库克此行的核心目标之一， 同时他还肩负着与国内运营商协商在 iPhone Air 中推广 eSIM 技术的重要使命。

item.title: 接替王腾，魏思琪新任小米中国区市场部总经理
item.guid: 接替王腾，魏思琪新任小米中国区市场部总经理
item.description:
Recently, Xu Fei, Vice President and CMO of Xiaomi Group, released a live video of Xiaomi's October Marketing System All-Hands Meeting, and at this conference, named Wei Siqi as the new General Manager of the China Marketing Department. 近日， 小米集团副总裁、CMO 许斐公布了小米 10 月市场体系全员会的现场视频，并在本次大会中称魏思琪为新任中国区市场部总经理。

It is reported that Wei Siqi joined Xiaomi Group in 2013, where she was responsible for Xiaomi's official website product page design and presentation PPTs. In 2018, she joined the Xiaomi CC team, responsible for product design. From December 2021, she took over as the head of the Xiaomi Digital Series product line. 据悉，魏思琪于 2013 年加入小米集团工作，负责过小米官网产品页设计及发布会 PPT；2018 年加入小米 CC 团队，负责产品设计；2021 年 12 月起接任小米数字系列产品线负责人。

On October 8, 2024, Lu Weibing, President of Xiaomi Group, mentioned Wei Siqi, then Xiaomi mobile phone product manager, on Weibo. She had already started participating in automotive market businesses such as the Xiaomi SU7 launch last year, and subsequently held two important management positions: General Manager of Xiaomi Mobile Phone Marketing Department and Deputy General Manager of Xiaomi Auto Marketing Department. 2024 年 10 月 8 日，小米集团总裁卢伟冰曾在微博中提到时任小米手机产品经理的魏思琪，她已经在去年开始参与小米 SU7 发布等汽车市场业务，并在之后兼任两个重要管理岗位：小米手机市场部总经理和小米汽车市场部副总经理。

Currently, Wei Siqi's Weibo verification information has been changed from 'General Manager of Xiaomi Mobile Phone Marketing Department, Deputy General Manager of Xiaomi Auto Marketing Department' to 'General Manager of Xiaomi China Marketing Department.' 目前，魏思琪微博认证信息以从「小米手机市场部总经理，小米汽车市场部副总经理」更改为「小米中国区市场部总经理」。

It is worth mentioning that Wang Teng, former General Manager of Xiaomi's China Marketing Department, was dismissed in September this year due to leaking secrets. 值得一提的是，小米原中国区市场部总经理王腾于今年 9 月因泄密被辞退。

item.title: OpenAI 员工否认 GPT-6 年底见
item.description:
Recently, Evercore ISI analyst Mark Mahaney stated in an interview with CNBC that OpenAI's next-generation model, GPT-6, is expected to be launched before the end of this year, bringing significant performance improvements. 近期，Evercore ISI 分析师 Mark Mahaney 在接受 CNBC 采访时表示，OpenAI 的新一代模型 GPT-6 预计会在今年年底前推出，并且带来显著的性能提升。

Subsequently, Roon (X account @tszzl, a member of the OpenAI technical team, widely believed to be Tarun Gogineni), who is considered an OpenAI employee, retweeted the above content and said "No," denying the report. 随后， 被认为是 OpenAI 员工的 Roon（X 账号为 @tszzl，OpenAI 技术团队一名成员，普遍认为是 Tarun Gogineni）转发上述内容并表示「No」，否认了该报道。

According to BleepingComputer, while OpenAI may not release GPT-6 this year, it does not mean it won't release other new models, "possibly GPT-5.5." 而据媒体 BleepingComputer 表示，尽管 OpenAI 在今年可能不会发布 GPT-6，但这并不意味着其不会发布其他新模型，「或有可能发布 GPT-5.5」。

In August this year, OpenAI officially released GPT-5, which can automatically switch between different model versions (including standard and Pro editions). According to the introduction at the time, GPT-5 reduced the factual error rate by 45% compared to GPT-4o; in deep thinking mode, the error rate dropped by 80% compared to o3. 今年 8 月，OpenAI 正式发布了 GPT-5，并能够自动切换不同版本模型（含标准版、Pro）。据当时介绍，GPT-5 与 GPT-4o 相比，事实错误率降低了 45%；在深度思考模式下，错误率更是比 o3 暴降了 80%。

item.title: 我国生成式人工智能用户规模超 5 亿
item.guid: 我国生成式人工智能用户规模超-5-亿
item.description:
According to Xinhua News Agency, on October 18, the China Internet Network Information Center released the "Generative AI Application Development Report (2025)" at the 2025 (6th) China Internet Basic Resources Conference. 据新华社报道，10 月 18 日，中国互联网络信息中心在 2025（第六届）中国互联网基础资源大会上发布《生成式人工智能应用发展报告（2025）》。

The report shows that as of June 2025, the number of generative AI users in China reached 515 million, an increase of 266 million from December 2024, doubling the user base in half a year; the penetration rate is 36.5%. 报告显示，截至 2025 年 6 月，我国生成式人工智能用户规模达 5.15 亿人，较 2024 年 12 月增长 2.66 亿人，用户规模半年翻番；普及率为 36.5%。

The report believes that generative AI is gradually integrating into the daily lives of various groups in China, with young and middle-aged, highly educated users being the core group. Among all generative AI users: 报告认为，生成式人工智能正逐渐融入我国各类群体的日常生活中，中青年、高学历用户是核心群体。在所有生成式人工智能用户中：

    Users under 40, comprising young and middle-aged individuals, account for 74.6%;

    Highly educated users with college degrees, bachelor's degrees, or higher account for 37.5%, the report points out;

    Domestic generative AI large models are widely favored by users and are driving intelligent transformation and upgrading in various application scenarios.

The survey found that over 90% of users prefer domestic large models. Generative AI is widely applied in various scenarios such as intelligent search, content creation, office assistants, and smart hardware, and is also actively explored and practiced in fields like agricultural production, industrial manufacturing, and scientific research. 调查发现，超九成用户首选国产大模型。生成式人工智能被广泛应用于智能搜索、内容创作、办公助手、智能硬件等多种场景，还在农业生产、工业制造、科学研究等领域得到积极探索实践。

item.title: 💡 智元机器人高级副总裁：人形机器人不会被一两家垄断
item.guid: 💡-智元机器人高级副总裁：人形机器人不会被一两家垄断
item.description:
Recently, Wang Chuang, Senior Vice President of Zhiyuan Robotics, accepted an interview with Sina Finance. Regarding the competitive landscape of the domestic humanoid robot industry, Wang Chuang believes that this industry will eventually be larger than the automotive industry, and it is impossible for one or two leading companies to monopolize it. 日前，智元机器人高级副总裁王闯接受新浪财经的采访，对于如何看待国内人形机器人产业的竞争格局，王创认为，这个产业最终会比汽车产业还要大，不可能是一两家龙头垄断。

Wang Chuang pointed out that the humanoid robot industry has several characteristics: 王闯指出，人形机器人产业有几个特点：

    The industry scale is large enough, with many different demands in segmented fields, and each company may have its own areas of expertise;

    Every region globally has many differentiated demands. If a company can focus on these differentiated demands, it might perform even better than leading large companies. "For example, some mobile phone manufacturers thrive in Africa, and some car companies do very well in the off-road vehicle segment."

At the same time, Wang Chuang also stated in the interview that the difficulty of deploying humanoid robots is tiered, and working at home is actually the most challenging scenario because it involves many problems, such as safety issues, cost issues, high generalization for various complex tasks, and not damaging household items. These problems are very difficult. However, in some simpler scenarios, humanoid robots can already be deployed this year. 同时，王闯也在采访中表示，人形机器人落地的难度是分阶梯的，而到家里干活其实是最难的场景，因为它要解决的问题非常多，比如安全问题、成本问题、同时对各种复杂任务的泛化性要高，且不能破坏家里的东西，这些问题是非常难。但在一些简单的场景，人形机器人今年就已经可以落地了。

"Last year, humanoid robots couldn't even walk steadily; this year, everyone can see robots running around and even performing various fancy dances," Wang Chuang predicted. "The development speed this year has been incredibly fast. In our view, many problems we previously thought would take 3-5 years to solve have been resolved in the past year." 「去年人形机器人还走不稳，今年大家能看到机器人满地跑，甚至能够跳各种花里胡哨的舞蹈」，王闯预测，「这一年的发展速度已经非常快了，在我们看来很多过去我们认为可能 3-5 年后能解决的问题，过去一年都被解决掉了。」

Regarding the question of "robots replacing humans," Wang Chuang pointed out that the prerequisite for machines to replace humans is a very high success rate, but from a cost perspective, machines cannot yet replace manual labor. "It's too early to talk about replacing manual labor now; it would be great if they could replace it in the next five years." 对于如何看待「机器人替人」这一问题，王闯指出，想让机器代替人的前提条件是有非常好的成功率，但从成本角度讲，机器还不能替代人工。「现在谈替代人工还早得很，未来五年能替代就已经很不错了。」

In Wang Chuang's view, the reasonable path for the deployment of robots (including humanoids) will follow a sequence: first, avoid areas that involve direct contact with the physical world. Instead, focus on areas that can demonstrate their movement and interaction capabilities, easily integrate with large language models and multimodal models, provide excellent user experience, and bring practical value. Finally, address areas involving contact with the physical world. 在王闯看来，机器人（含人形）落地的合理路线，会遵循先不做跟物理世界接触的领域，而是要先做那些能够把自己的运动能力、交互能力体现出来，且能很容易地与大语言模型、多模态模型结合的领域，是那些能给用户带来很好的体验，能带来实际价值的领域，最后再做跟物理世界接触。

item.title: iQOO 15 今晚发布
item.description:

    Equipped with the fifth-generation Snapdragon 8 Extreme Edition, LPDDR5X Ultra (read/write speed up to 9600Mbps), and UFS4.1;

    Equipped with a 7000mAh Blue Ocean battery, supporting 100W wired fast charging and 40W wireless fast charging; features a 0916 vibration motor and dual 1511 speakers.

item.title: 真我 GT8 Pro 支持五年系统维护
item.guid: 真我-GT8-Pro-支持五年系统维护
item.description:
Recently, Xu Qi, Vice President of Realme, announced that the new Realme GT8 Pro will support five years of system maintenance and four major Android versions, claiming to be "a true flagship that serves users comprehensively, from hardware to software." 日前，真我副总裁徐起发文宣布，真我 GT8 Pro 新机将支持五年系统维护以及四个安卓大版本，并号称「从硬件到软件，做一款全方位服务好用户的真旗舰」。

He also stated that the Realme GT8 Pro will debut the brand-new realmeUI 7.0, featuring a new light-and-shadow glass design aesthetic and a streaming light engine. 同时其还表示，真我 GT8 Pro 将首发全新的 realmeUI 7.0，拥有全新的光影玻璃设计美学和流光引擎。

Additionally, the new phone will be equipped with a 7000mAh Titan battery, supporting 120W wired fast charging and 50W wireless fast charging, with a body thickness controlled at 8.2mm; it will feature full-cavity symmetrical dual 1115E master-grade speakers and an 0816 ESA ultra-wideband motor, offering n79 band support and ultrasonic fingerprint unlocking. 另外，新机将搭载 7000mAh 泰坦电池，支持 120W 有线快充和 50W 无线快充，机身厚度控制在 8.2mm；配备全腔对称式双 1115E 大师级扬声器和 0816 ESA 超宽频马达，提供 n79 频段和超声波指纹解锁。

The new phone also features a 50-megapixel Ricoh GR anti-glare main camera and a 200-megapixel ultra-light-and-shadow periscope telephoto lens, supporting 4K 120fps Dolby Vision video recording and 4K 120fps 10bit Log professional recording. 新机还配备 5000 万理光 GR 防眩光主摄和 2 亿超光影潜望长焦，支持 4K 120 帧杜比视界视频拍摄、4K 120 帧 10bit Log 专业录制。

The Realme GT8 Pro will be officially released on October 21st. 真我 GT8 Pro 将在 10 月 21 日正式发布。

item.title: 努比亚 Z80 Ultra 新增滤镜「调色盘」
item.guid: 努比亚-Z80-Ultra-新增滤镜「调色盘」
item.description:
Yesterday, Nubia officially announced that the new Z80 Ultra supports a brand-new "Color Palette" filter function. 昨日，努比亚官方发文宣布，新机 Z80 Ultra 支持全新的滤镜「调色盘」功能。

According to official information, the Z80 Ultra's "Color Palette" filter can quickly adjust the filter's hue, saturation, and light and shadow intensity. 根据官方公布的信息显示，Z80 Ultra 的滤镜「调色盘」能够快速调节滤镜的色调、饱和度以及光影强度。

In terms of imaging hardware, the new phone will feature a fifth-generation native 35mm custom optical main camera with a Light & Shadow 990 custom sensor; the ultra-wide-angle uses a main camera-grade large sensor with an equivalent 18mm focal length; the periscope telephoto supports 15cm telephoto macro; it also offers a physical mechanical shutter button and a professional imaging kit. 影像硬件上，新机将配备第五代原生 35mm 定制光学主摄，配备光影 990 定制传感器；超广角采用主摄级大底，拥有等效 18mm 焦段；潜望式长焦支持 15cm 长焦微距；提供实体机械快门键和专业影像套装。

In other aspects, the Nubia Z80 Ultra will feature a 6.85″ punch-hole-free full screen, powered by the Qualcomm fifth-generation Snapdragon 8 Extreme Edition processor, LPDDR5X, and UFS4.1; it will have a 7200mAh battery and support 90W wired charging / 80W wireless charging. 其他方面，努比亚 Z80 Ultra 将配备 6.85″ 无挖孔全面屏，搭载高通第五代骁龙 8 至尊版处理器和 LPDDR5X 和 UFS4.1；拥有 7200mAh 电池和 90W 有线充电 / 80W 无线充电。

The new phone will be officially released on October 22nd. 新机将于 10 月 22 日正式发布。

item.title: 国航航班因锂电池自燃备降
item.guid: 国航航班因锂电池自燃备降
item.description:
According to a report by The Beijing News, on October 18th, a netizen posted that a luggage rack on an Air China flight from Hangzhou to South Korea suddenly caught fire, and the flight made an emergency landing at Shanghai Pudong International Airport. At 12:39 PM on the same day, Air China issued a statement: 据新京报报道，10 月 18 日有网友发文称杭州飞往韩国的国航航班上行李架突然着火，航班紧急备降上海浦东国际机场。当日 12 时 39 分，中国国际航空发布情况通报称：

On October 18th, on flight CA139 from Hangzhou to Incheon, a lithium battery in a passenger's carry-on luggage stored in the overhead compartment spontaneously combusted. The crew immediately handled the situation according to procedures, and no injuries occurred. To ensure flight safety, the aircraft made an emergency landing at Shanghai Pudong Airport. Air China has arranged another aircraft to continue the flight mission. 10 月 18 日，由杭州飞往仁川的 CA139 航班，一名旅客存放在行李架上手提行李内锂电池自燃，机组按程序立即处置，未出现人员受伤。为确保飞行安全，飞机已备降上海浦东机场。国航已调配飞机继续执行该航班任务。

Mr. Shu, a passenger on the flight, stated in the report that the flight had probably covered about half its journey when he suddenly heard a "bang" and saw fire erupting from the forward-middle luggage rack. "At that time, the entire cabin was filled with smoke. The flight attendants reacted very quickly, using water and fire extinguishers to put out the fire, and some passengers also helped. The fire was eventually extinguished, but that row of luggage racks was blackened by smoke." 搭乘该趟航班的乘客舒先生通过报道表示，航班应该已经飞了差不多一半路程，突然听见「砰」的一声，就看到中部靠前的行李架火冒出来了。「当时，整个客舱都是烟，乘务员们反应很快，拿水、灭火器去扑灭，其间也有乘客接力帮忙。后来火被灭了，但那一排的行李架都被熏黑了。」

The report pointed out that, according to the latest requirements from the Civil Aviation Administration, starting from June 28th this year, passengers are prohibited from carrying power banks without a 3C mark, with an unclear 3C mark, or those of recalled models or batches on domestic flights. International flights are not subject to this requirement. 报道指出，据民航局最新要求，自今年 6 月 28 日起禁止旅客携带没有 3C 标识、3C 标识不清晰、已被召回型号或批次的充电宝乘坐境内航班，境外航班并不在此要求内。

However, according to Civil Aviation Administration regulations, lithium battery products are strictly prohibited from being checked in. If carried as hand luggage, the rated energy must not exceed 100Wh; if it exceeds 100Wh but not 160Wh, it may be carried only with airline approval, and no more than two such items are allowed. If greater than 160Wh, it is strictly prohibited on board. Furthermore, passengers are not allowed to use power banks during flight or charge electronic devices. For power banks with a power switch, they must remain off throughout the flight. 但据民航局规定，锂电池产品严禁托运。如随身携带，额定能量不能超过 100Wh；假如超过 100Wh 但不超过 160Wh，经航空公司批准后方可携带，但不得超过两个。如大于 160Wh，严禁带上飞机。此外，乘机人不得在飞行过程中使用充电宝，不能进行电子设备充电。对于有启动开关的充电宝，在飞行过程中应始终关闭。

item.title: 《星际争霸 2》国服将正式回归
item.description:
Recently, the official Weibo of "StarCraft" announced that the technical test for "StarCraft II" Chinese server will begin on October 21st, and the Chinese server will officially return on October 28th. 日前，《星际争霸》官方微博发文宣布，《星际争霸 2》国服技术测试将于 10 月 21 日开启，10 月 28 日国服将正式回归。

The official announcement states that game pre-download is now available. Players can pre-download the game after downloading and installing the Battle.net desktop application on their PC. 官方表示，目前游戏预下载已开放，可在 PC 端下载并安装战网桌面应用后进行游戏预下载。

At the same time, all previous account data for "StarCraft II" Chinese server has been fully preserved; after its return, the operations team will continue to maintain the reporting and anti-cheat system for "StarCraft II" Chinese server. 同时，《星际争霸 2》国服先前所有账号数据均被完整保留；回归后，运营团队将继续维护好《星际争霸 2》国服的举报与反作弊体系。

Additionally, the "StarCraft II" Celebrity Invitational will be held at the Hangzhou Esports Center from November 29th to 30th this year. 另外，《星际争霸 2》明星邀请赛将落地杭州电竞中心，于今年 11 月 29 日至 30 日举行。

item.title: 《神力科莎：拉力》下月上线抢先体验版
item.guid: 《神力科莎：拉力》下月上线抢先体验版
item.description:
Recently, 505 Games, Supernova Games Studios, and KUNOS Simulazioni announced that the latest installment in their "Assetto Corsa" series, "Assetto Corsa Rally," will launch in Early Access on Steam on November 13th. 日前，505 Games、Supernova Games Studios 与 KUNOS Simulazioni 宣布，旗下《神力科莎》系列的最新作品《神力科莎：拉力（Assetto Corsa Rally）》将于 11 月 13 日在 Steam 推出抢先体验版。

According to the introduction, "Assetto Corsa Rally" offers players a challenging and immersive experience through 3D laser-scanned tracks and cars, professional co-driver support, and dynamic environmental changes. 据介绍，《神力科莎：拉力》通过 3D 激光扫描的赛段和赛车、专业领航员支持以及动态环境变化，为玩家提供了高难度的沉浸式体验。

The game is also developed based on an optimized version of the critically acclaimed physics engine from the "Assetto Corsa" series (meticulously tuned to meet the demands of this motorsport) and a customized Unreal Engine 5. 游戏还基于《神力科莎》系列备受好评的物理引擎优化版（而且专为满足这项赛车运动需求而经过了精心调校）以及定制的虚幻 5 引擎开发而成。

"Assetto Corsa Rally" Early Access will feature 10 initial licensed cars, 4 rally stages from real-world rally races, and both offline and online game modes for players. 《神力科莎：拉力》抢先体验版将携 10 辆初始授权赛车、4 条来自现实拉力赛的拉力赛段以及离线和在线两种游戏模式与各位玩家见面。

Regarding pricing, the game is set at $29.99 USD (approximately 213.74 RMB), with the price for the Chinese region yet to be announced. 价格方面，本作定价 29.99 美元（约合 213.74 元人民币），国区价格暂未公布。

item.title: 电影《珍珠珍珠》发布概念海报
item.guid: 电影《珍珠珍珠》发布概念海报
item.description:
Recently, the film "Pearl Pearl" released its concept poster, and filming has officially commenced. 近日，电影《珍珠珍珠》发布概念海报，目前影片已正式开机。

It is reported that the film is written by Qiu Yujie, directed by An Nan and Ju Peilin, starring Zhou Yutong, with Qu Chuxiao making a special appearance, and Zhang Xueying and Chen Haosen as guest stars. 据悉，影片由邱玉洁编剧，安男、鞠沛霖执导，周雨彤领衔主演，屈楚萧特别出演，张雪迎、陈昊森特邀出演。

The film primarily tells the story of Yue Yue, who suffers from premature ovarian failure and severe dysmenorrhea, accidentally finding a stray dog and naming it "Pearl." This unexpected encounter drastically changes her life, but then the dog's original owner, Dou Sheng, suddenly appears, leading to a struggle over "Pearl." 该片主要讲述饱受卵巢早衰和重度痛经折磨的岳悦偶然捡到了一只流浪狗并为其取名「珍珠」，这场意外的相遇，让她的生活发生了巨大的改变，然而狗狗的原主人窦胜突然出现，一场围绕「珍珠」的争夺就此展开的故事。

item.title: 索尼确认《地平线：零之曙光》电影明年开拍
item.guid: 索尼确认《地平线：零之曙光》电影明年开拍
item.description:
According to The Game Post, a recent court filing revealed that Sony confirmed the script for its live-action "Horizon Zero Dawn" movie is now complete, with filming planned for 2026 and a target release in 2027. 据 The Game Post 报道，近期一份新的法庭文件披露，索尼确认其真人版《地平线：零之曙光》电影的剧本目前已完成，并计划 2026 年开拍，目标是 2027 年上映。

According to IT Home, as early as 2022, Sony announced a collaboration with Netflix to launch a live-action TV series for the "Horizon" franchise, with Steve Blackman of "The Umbrella Academy" serving as showrunner. However, the TV series project quietly ended in 2024, after allegations of misconduct against the show's creative team surfaced, causing the project to stall. 据 IT 之家消息，早在 2022 年，索尼曾宣布将与 Netflix 合作推出《地平线》系列的真人电视剧，由《伞学院》（The Umbrella Academy）的史蒂夫・布莱克曼（Steve Blackman）担任主创。然而，该电视剧项目在 2024 年悄然终止，原因是在针对该剧主创人员的不当行为指控曝光后，项目陷入停滞。

And in January of this year, at Sony's CES press conference, the company announced it would co-produce a "Horizon Zero Dawn" theatrical film with Columbia Pictures, the latter also being the production company for Sony's "Uncharted" (2022) and "Gran Turismo" (2023) film adaptations. 而在今年 1 月，在索尼的 CES 发布会上，公司宣布将与哥伦比亚影业（Columbia Pictures）联合制作一部《地平线：零之曙光》院线电影，后者也是索尼《神秘海域》（2022 年）和《GT 赛车：极速狂飙》（2023 年）改编电影的制作方。

The statement also specifically emphasized the central role of Aloy, the protagonist of "Horizon Zero Dawn" and "Horizon Forbidden West," within the PlayStation brand ecosystem. Zizelbash called her a "key iconic figure in the upcoming film" and noted her significant importance in driving the "IP ecosystem cycle." 声明还特别强调了《地平线：零之曙光》及《地平线：西之绝境》的主角埃洛伊（Aloy）在 PlayStation 品牌体系中的核心地位。齐兹尔巴什称她为「即将上映的电影中的关键标志性人物」，并指出她在推动「IP 生态循环」方面具有重要意义。

item.title: 《一战再战》内地票房突破千万
item.guid: 《一战再战》内地票房突破千万
item.description:
According to real-time data from Lighthouse Pro, as of 17:26 on October 18th, the film "War Again" box office exceeded 10 million, with cumulative viewership surpassing 230,000. 据灯塔专业版实时数据，截至 10 月 18 日 17 时 26 分，影片《一战再战》票房突破 1000 万。，累计观影人次破 23 万。

According to recent reports from Watch Hollywood, "War Again" grossed approximately 4.77 million RMB on its opening day in mainland China; after three weeks of global release, its box office (as of last Wednesday) reported $57.36 million in North America and $142.56 million worldwide. The film's production cost is reportedly over $130 million. 而据守望好莱坞近期报道，《一战再战》内地上映首日票房约 477 万元；全球开始上映三个星期，票房 （截至上周三结束）报北美 5736 万美元、全球 1.4256 亿美元。而影片制作成本方面，据报道称为 1.3+ 亿美元。

The film is written, directed, and produced by Paul Thomas Anderson, starring Leonardo DiCaprio. It tells the story of father Bob, who embarks on a perilous journey with the help of "The Master" to rescue his daughter Vera, engaging in a 16-year fated battle with his arch-nemesis Colonel Rockjaw. 影片由保罗・托马斯・安德森编剧、执导并担任制片，莱昂纳多・迪卡普里奥领衔主演，讲述父亲鲍勃为营救女儿薇拉，与宿敌洛克乔上校展开一场跨越 16 年的宿命之战，并在「大师」的协助下踏上惊险旅程。

The film received rave reviews at the 9th Pingyao International Film Festival and overseas screenings, with a big V recommendation rate of 98%, Rotten Tomatoes freshness score of 98%, and MTC score of 96, making it the highest-rated film of the past decade and considered the "strongest contender" for the Oscar awards season. 该片在第九届平遥国际电影展及海外放映中口碑爆棚，大 V 推荐度高达 98%、烂番茄新鲜度 98%、MTC 评分 96，成为近十年综合评分最高的电影，被视为奥斯卡颁奖季的「最强种子选手」。
